des: "Decadent thick and delicious hot fudge sauce. Simple to make and so much better than store-bought!"
ins: Combine butter, cocoa, sugar and evaporated milk in a saucepan over medium heat.  Bring to a boil and boil for 7 minutes.  Remove from heat; stir in vanilla.  Carefully pour hot mixture into a blender and blend for 2 to 4 minutes.  Serve immediately.  Store in refrigerator.
